topics.body:
"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54f50a326368727614da0100#post_54f50a326368727614da0100
[bq="mariomarc"]You know one trope there is way too much of, is when guy is fighting girl, and girl goes scantily clad, and guy gets flustered and can't fight

Just once can the girl go scantily clad expecting him to freak, and then he doesn't actually give a shit
I mean for fuck sake, it's not hard to control a libido[/bq]
Something similar happened in Rave Master. Basically a guy was fighting one of the main female characters. His plan was to just melt off her clothes and have her get super embarrassed before he went in forthe kill. And he managed to get most of her clothes off. Problem was she wasn't embarrassed, she was PISSED OFF. So she just proceeded to tear off the rest of her clothes and beat the shit out of the guy. She said that shame has no place in a lifer or death struggle.
